page.title: 12Sandringham Gardens
page.content:
These fall into two sections:-
{The Grounds}- These extend for 70 acres around Sandringham House. About 18 years ago they were replanted to provide a mature woodland garden landscape second to none.
{Commercial Gardens}- This undertaking centres round the old kitchen gardens and glasshouses. Here, pot-plants and flowers are grown to decorate The House and to sell to visitors. In addition, soft fruits, strawberries, raspberries and blackcurrants, are grown as pick-your-own crops, much valued by local people and visitors alike.
